#summary What has changed between releases.
#labels Featured

If you have a feature request or found a bug, please [http://code.google.com/p/chrome-extension-geolocation/issues/list submit an issue].

= Versions =

== Version 1.0.0.2 (2011-02-07) ==

  * New: Possibility to select the country (Issue 4)
  * New: Find WOEID (Yahoo) to the given address (Issue 7)
  * Turn off scroll bars on popup resize (Issue 8)

== Version 1.0.0.1 (2011-01-20) ==

  * New: Possibility to copy the value of latitude & longitude with a "Copy" button (Issue 2)
  * New: Save current status (address, latitude & longitude, map) on popup close (Issue 3)

== Version 1.0.0.0 (2011-01-17) ==

  * Initial version.
